hints.content:
$\begin{align}
&\blue{3=6-2}\\
&\blue{3=4}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $3$ is not the same as $4$.

$\begin{align}
&\pink{4=2+3}\\
&\pink{4=5}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $4$ is not the same as $5$.

$\begin{align}
&\purple{11=10+1}\\
&\purple{11=11}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $11$ is the same as $11$.
